metadata.author: Security Scanner Team
metadata.description: Detects Cisco IOS version from banner or system information. This pattern matches the detailed version string format used by Cisco devices.

test_cases.input: Cisco IOS Software, C2960 Software (C2960-LANBASEK9-M), Version 15.0(2)SE11, RELEASE SOFTWARE (fc3)

metadata.author: Security Scanner Team
metadata.description: Detects Cisco IOS version from simplified version strings that might appear in logs or other outputs.

test_cases.input: System restarted at 10:30:15 UTC Wed Jul 15 2020 Cisco IOS Version 15.2(4)M11
